events.name: Canes and Outdoor Games
events.description: Come to Briggs Field for Cane's chicken and have a ball playing spikeball, soccer, ultimate, football, and more! Vegetarian options available.

events.name: Sushi and Poker
events.description: Enjoy delicious sushi while learning poker from our brothers. Perfect for beginners and experienced players alike.

events.name: Paintball
events.description: Join us for an exciting day of paintball! Equipment provided. No experience necessary.

events.name: Thai Food and House Tours
events.description: Enjoy authentic Thai cuisine while exploring our beautiful Brookline home. Learn about our brotherhood and living spaces.

events.name: Minigolf
events.description: Fun evening of minigolf with brothers. Prizes for winners!

events.name: Go Karting
events.description: High-speed fun with go karting! Race against brothers and see who's the fastest.

events.name: Bowling and Arcade
events.description: Classic bowling and arcade games. Perfect for friendly competition and fun.

events.name: Late Night IHOP
events.description: Late night pancakes and conversation at IHOP. Great way to end the day!

events.name: Battle Canoes
events.description: Exciting canoe battles on the Charles River! Team up with brothers for epic water battles.

events.name: Mediterranean Dinner*
events.description: Elegant Mediterranean dinner with brothers. Invite only event.

events.name: Level 99*
events.description: Exclusive gaming experience at Level 99. Invite only event.

events.name: Rock Climbing*
events.description: Indoor rock climbing adventure. Equipment provided. Invite only event.

events.name: Fried Chicken Dinner*
events.description: Delicious fried chicken dinner with brothers. Invite only event.

events.name: Sunset Boat Cruise*
events.description: Beautiful sunset cruise on the Charles River. Perfect ending to rush week. Invite only event.
